name: TriPhrase
description:
Enjoy word and phrase guessing games like Charades, CatchPhrase, Pictionary, and Scattegories?  You will love TriPhrase.  TriPhrase is a Team based party game.

The goal of TriPhrase is for your team to guess all the correct words / phrases before time runs out.  The terms are loosely grouped in increasing difficulty with more points awarded for more challenging words.
TriPhase works best in teams with equal participants on each team.

Sit or stand in a circle so that no 2 teammates are next to each other.

Give the phone or tablet to the first person on team 1 (Blue).  This person will be giving the clues during the first round.  After team 1 guesses all three phrases or time runs out, pass the phone to the right.  This is team 2's player to give the round 1 clues.  When time expires or all of the words / phrases are guessed, pass to the right and start round 2, etc.

Clues can be any words or phrases so long as the clue does not include any form of any word that is part of the answer.  Also, clues such as "starts with" or "sounds like" are not allowed.

Example word / phrase:  Peanut Butter
Example valid clue: "Blank and Jelly sandwich"
Example invalid clues: "PB and J" or "Starts with P and Jelly"

Grab some friends and start guessing!
